Skill.label: Movement Skill (Swap FB for FD after Brutus)
Lightning Trap - Swap out Stormblast Mine
Purity of Elements - Can use instead of Skitterbot

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x70FF70 Leveling Spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1g-Ai5ASZKGxYmnNIwCjHPzs7mwnisrAMzvi2Gv9biDg/edit?usp=sharing
Shopping List (Will update after league start): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ls9CqGJaZ_g9lcR8e_g9Ewh-d00Rl0owFiRFXILxDo8/edit?usp=sharing
Video Build Guide:
Discord: https://discord.gg/BNmaDeckuq
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/lolcohol
Regarding the Skills Section: ^xC8C8C8 Each section contains new gem setups, but keep using things like Flame Dash/Assassin's Mark/Auras from previous sections unless stated otherwise _______________________________________________________________
^6^7///ACT I///^7^xAF6025 ^xC8C8C8 Gems with * (asterisks) are MANDATORY. The others are ones you should get if you can afford them early Colour of Writing is Gem Colour ^7 ^xD02090^xB97123 //MANDATORY GEMS^7^xB97123//^7 ^5^1^2^3^4^5^6 *Stormblast Mine After kiling Hillock (We're using Stormblast Mine for a bit to level) ^x8888FF^xB97123^xC8C8C8^x8888FF ^xD02090^6B^2G - ^6Stormblast Mine + ^2Lesser Poison ^7 ^2 Lesser Poison Twilight Strand
^7^6^6^xC8C8C8^6 *Orb of Storms Breaking Some Eggs - Reward BB - Frostblink + Arcane Surge *Frostblink Breaking Some Eggs - Reward BB^2G - ^6Frost Bomb + ^2Onslaught + ^6Orb of Storms *Frost Bomb Breaking Some Eggs - Buy from Nessa B^2GG - ^6Stormblast Mine - ^2Swift Assembly - Lesser Poison ^2 ^2 Onslaught Hailrake - Buy from Nessa ^6 Arcane Surge Hailrake - Buy from Nessa ^2 Swift Assembly Hailrake Reward _______________________________________________________________ ^xD02090 //Bonus Gems// (Important but NOT urgent - get if you can afford) ^7 ^2 Bear Trap Breaking Some Eggs - Buy from Nessa ^1 Steelskin Breaking Some Eggs - Buy from Nessa ^xB97123_______________________________________________________________ //After Brutus// ^5^4 TRIAL: LOWER PRISON LEVEL 1 ^2 ^6 *Flame Dash Swap out Frostblink for Flame Dash *Added Lightning Damage ^5(Can get this after reaching Lower Prison Waypoint) ^6BB^2G - ^6Stormblast Mine - ^2Swift Assembly - ^1^6Added Lightning Damage
^2 Trap Support Smoke Mine ^6 Increased Critical Strikes
^2^1 NB: ^1 *Exsanguinate - You get this after reaching the Cavern of Anger. Start to level it but no need to use it yet ^6 *Lightning Trap - You get this after reaching Merveil's Caverns. Swap this out for Stormblast mine BB^2G - ^6Lightning Trap - Added Lightning Damage ^2Swift Assembly
^xFFFF77 ************** IMPORTANT!!!!!! Magic Wand + Alteration + Normal Res Ring = Huge DPS boost. Required Level 8******************^7
^6^5 If you use a magic ring, it will give T7 flat damage to spells and require level 12. If you use a rare resistance ring, it will give T6 flat damage to spells and require level 20 ^7^xFFFF77
^xC8C8C8 ______________________________________________________________
^1^8^9^6^7///ACT II///
^3^6Herald of Thunder Save Helena Using this to add more damage Summon Skitterbots Save Helena Using this to chill and shock enemies for more damage BBG - Lightning Trap + Ele Focus + Trap and Mine Damage
Increased Critical Damage Sharp and Cruel Elemental Focus Sharp and Cruel NB: Magic Wand + Alteration + Magic Res Ring = At lvl 14 B -Skitterbots ^2Trap and Mine Damage Sharp and Cruel NB: Magic Wand + Alteration + Rare Res Ring = At Level 20 ^6B - Herald of Thunder ^6Controlled Destruction Sharp and Cruel BB^2G - ^6Lightning Trap + ^6Ele Focus +^2 Trap and Mine Damage
^3 ^8^5^4TRIAL: CHAMBER of SINS LEVEL 2 TRIAL: CRYPT LEVEL 1 (Fellshrine Ruins)
^xFFFF77 ************** IMPORTANT!!!!!! Magic Wand + Alteration + RARE Res Ring = Huge DPS boost. Required Level 2******************^7 BANDITS: KILL ALL BANDITS: KILL ALL ^7________________________________________________________________
^7 ///ACT III///
^6Elemental Weakness ^7Lost in Love Reward - Use this curse while leveling for more DPS ^1Pride ^6^7Lost in Love (Tolman in Crematorium Quest) Quest Reward/Buy - NOT urgent yet ^6Assassin's Mark ^7 Lost in Love Quest Reward/Buy NOT URGENT YET
^3^6Purity of Elements ^7Lost in Love - If your DPS is fine, use this instead of Skitterbots for now
^6Lightning Spire Trap Kill Gravicius (Sever the Right Hand) Reward ^2 GGG^5^6B - ^1^1Flamethrower Trap + Seismic Trap + Elemental Focus + Trap and Mine Damage ^2Seismic Trap Buy - 1 Chance Orb BBG - Lightning Trap + Multiple Traps + Elemental Focus ^2Flamethrower Trap Buy - 1 Chance Orb BBBG - Lightning Spire Trap + Elemental Focus + Trap and Mine Damage + Controlled Destruction Multiple Traps Buy From Nessa Act 1A ^5Stop using Stormblast Mine and Frost Bomb and Orb of Storms here
^3^2Advanced Traps A Fixture of Fate (Siosa) ^6^5Siosa/Library isn't super important to do for this build, but you can if you want to ^1
For Bossing: Throw all your traps down and watch the boss be deleted
^5^1^1^2^3^4 TRIAL: CREMATORIUM TRIAL: CATACOMBS TRIAL: THE GARDENS (Top Left Corner) ^1^7______________________________________________________________
///ACT IV - ACT VII///
RGGG - Exsanguinate + Chain + Trap + Multiple Traps ^ You can keep using Lightning Trap + the other traps here instead - it will clear fine. It might be hadr to swap to Exsang Traps this early
Check Skills section for final gem setup
^7
